title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Generative AI-Enabled STEM Project Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design a STEM problem-solving process in three or more stages utilizing generative AI tools.
Through design-based learning, learners can implement one sustainable energy solution prototype in a VR environment.
Learners can critically analyze and improve AI-generated outcomes according to inquiry-based learning methodologies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
